video.source: Your browser does not support the video tag.

div.p: Empowers professionals through expert-led training and career support.

div.class: about-area team-training inc-fixed-bg default-padding-bottom default-padding-top bg-color-custom z_index

div.p: Workforce Institute is the premier destination for training, staffing, executive education, and career transitions. We empower professionals to build fulfilling careers through project-driven learning, peer collaboration, and guidance from expert instructors and coaches.

a.title: Online data science and generative AI program

div.p: Looking to enhance your team's skills and career growth, contact our team today to explore how Workforce Institute can support your training, staffing, and professional development needs.

div.class: about-area personal-training inc-fixed-bg default-padding-bottom default-padding-top bg-color-custom z_index

div.p: At Workforce Institute, we empower professionals to advance their careers in high-demand fields through hands-on, project-driven learning. Our online training programs offer affordable pathways to valuable careers, providing:
Our bootcamps and certification programs cater to all experience levels, helping you build the skills needed to excel, switch careers, and increase earning potential.
We offer tailored learning paths for a range of professions, ensuring you gain the expertise needed for your desired role.
Plus, Workforce Institute provides comprehensive career support services to students after program completion. Contact our team today to discover the perfect program for your goals
div.div: Generative AI Data Analyst | UI/UX Design Bootcamp | Digital Marketing Bootcamp

div.p: UI/UX Designer

Thank you for the kind message. I appreciate the support and guidance your team provides. Your programs have helped me grow and stay motivated in my learning journey. I am grateful to be part of this community and I look forward to continuing to learn and improve my skills. Wishing you and your team a joyful Thanksgiving filled with peace and good moments.
UI/UX Course

The live sessions in the UI/UX program provides valuable insights and instruction. You have the opportunity to get direct feedback on your work so you can make improvements as you go along. Our instructor was upbeat, friendly and always willing to help.​
UI/UX Course

The UI/UX program really stood out to me on day one. Very well organized and put together. I enjoyed the weekly zoom lectures and was able to get my questions answered promptly. The information was engaging and definitely has helped shaped me as a designer. I recommend this program!​
UI/UX Course

I have signed up for the 24-week immersive program for UX/UI design. The 24-weeks with the immersive program has given me new experiences and helped me develop career skills, my teachers and counselors made sure I was on track and picking up the skills I needed for my future career.
Digital Marketing Course

Feeling thankful that I found this program at the right moment in my life. For a while I was contemplating changing careers but felt hesitant to do so because I lacked certain skills. This immersive program not only gave me the confidence to pursue a new career, but the job ready skills I will need day one.​
UI/UX Course

This UX/UI University Immersive program was honestly a great experience. I felt that I was able to expand my horizons as an artist and learn how to create applications. Everyone was extremely kind and I loved being able to work with peers who were in this journey with me, and receive feedback that made me a stronger designer.​
UI/UX Course

Wow, what an experience. There was great communication throughout each part of my journey, and that was instrumental to my success. The program is taught by a professional working in the UX/UI field, so that means you’re getting a highly practical learning experience. And the support following the course? That exceeded my expectations. They are dedicated to making sure you represent yourself and your skill-set well via LinkedIn and your CV/resume. All in all, a solid program. ​
UI/UX Course

"I Joined Hofstra Ux/Ui program with very little knowledge but I was very interested in the topic. The curriculum was very well structured and a lot of learning materials. The mentor sessions were the most beneficial and productive part. My mentor had all the availability and dedication to answer all my questions. I am now in the process of finding a job in the field of UI in which a career coach is assisting me, now I feel much more confident in my abilities and I am excited to continue on this career path.
UI/UX Course
I have built the confidence, skill set and professional development necessary to seek out roles in the UX field
UI/UX Course
The 6 month UX/UI certification program gave me the skill set, credibility, and confidence needed to be promoted from a Graphic Designer to a UI/Visual Designer at my current company. - Alexis Nelson
